full_text: IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR J.E. DATE 8/20/05 TIME 8:45 A.M. M Tony OF PHONE/MOBILE 561/790-5475 TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL X CAME TO SEE YOU WANTS TO SEE YOU RETURNED YOUR CALL WILL CALL AGAIN RUSH SPECIAL ATTENTION MESSAGE SIGNED J.

text_blocks.content: TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL CAME TO SEE YOU WANTS TO SEE YOU RETURNED YOUR CALL WILL CALL AGAIN RUSH SPECIAL ATTENTION

additional_notes: The document is a photocopy or scan of an original message slip. The image quality is poor, with visible speckles and a bright spot at the bottom. The document has been annotated with handwritten text.
